com.qtfx.lib.gui

Class StatusBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtfx.lib.gui.StatusBar

  • public class StatusBar
extends java.lang.Object
    A status bar utility. Extends flow pane with default right horizontal alignment.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
